labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The popup does not show, and the keycombo does not open the overlay.
data.expected_result: The popup should show telling you the keycombo you chose to open the overlay, and the keycombo actually opens the overlay like it does in all other games. (all I know, this may occur with other games, too)
data.short_description: The overlay doesn't show in Ori and the Blind Forest
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch Ori and the Blind Forest on Steam - Notice how the popup showing you the key combo to open the overlay doesn't show - Notice how the overlay also doesn't open on the key combo you set. - Notice how it works fine on other games. (The bug isn't Unity engine specific, as the overlay works with Subnautica that was also made in Unity)
